dialog.line: You see, lil'Plip Plop.
I'm really proud to be your cousin.
For real! You're an energy example!
You're holding your tongue but... when Mum bestowed you that pretty legs...
Poof! You dashed like a firework!
You're not wasting your time, at last.
Enjoying the island, no time to relax endlessly, and.
You can applause yourself!
Or... just stomp eh, that's fun too.
My name is Taka, by the way, hehe. The mossy jewel of the sea.
But hey! Just look at'em! Lazy tourists!
They're visiting a true and huge paradise.
"Oooooh, nice, here is a big stool for my upper-middle class petty butt!"
"Let's do NOTHING, sheesh! I'm so weary!"
Ewwwww.
Not really frisky, don't ya think?
That would be sooooo fun to turn the tables, eh?
And by "turning the table", I mean, "flipping", you see?
Just, picture it to yourself:
The guy is relaxed.
Perfectly sat on his stool... peacefully.
He's bottleflipping, whooosh!
And crash!, he's faceplanting in the sand, eheh!
I'd pay a good price to watch that stunt.
Just a little... bottleflip with the dude on the stool
Huehuehuehuehue.
Ok, I see, you didn't get it.
Just think about the joke.
The tourist is sat on the stool
And you... hahahahah!
You ARE the stool!
Then you jump, he doesn't understand...
With a lil front flip,
THE DUDE SLIPS THEN!
Hahah... hah.
You still didn't get it?
But please... just a lil pasting.
Be nice.
You snatch him the stool, make him slips,
Joke's end, tada, fun!
An unbidden guest must bring his stool with him, ya know.
I have seen the thing!
That was AWE - SOME!
The bottleflip you did... pfpfpfrprrprprprppff!
and then THE FALL!!
You think you can achieve it with two on one move???
The show would be AWE - SOMER
Maybe there's a way to botteflip two tourists on one move...
Knock on wood!
Fishes and schools, kid!
Think about fishes activities!
They're going in schools...
And when you're in a school, you're sittin'on a...
Hey, don't gimme that glare, the joke was insane, ok?
I was really proud of it.
That was what I call a show.
If I was able to applause, or stomp, like you, eheh.
I would do it ten billion times!
Moreover, you're gifted, cousin.
I think, very seriously, you may plan a career on it.
Maybe... yes, pick that sunglasses!
A muscled lady lost them,
Tall woman, beefy hips, a crazy gal from the movies, long time ago.
She was the kind of "supermartial arts warrior-monk chain-combo broken gal" you see only in karate movies.
Now you can easily coolspotting your way with her sexy sunglasses.
